channel.title: Comments on: Ricotta Hotcakes with Honeycomb Butter by Bill Granger

item.title: By: Danielle
item.dc:creator: Danielle
item.description: Hey Anita, Great post! I just made these for Valentines brunch and they were delicious. They were last minute so I didn't make the honeycomb butter so we just ate them with maple syrup and they were fab. These will probably be my basic pancake recipe from now on. The ricotta makes all the difference hey?
item.content:encoded:
Hey Anita, Great post! I just made these for Valentines brunch and they were delicious. They were last minute so I didn’t make the honeycomb butter so we just ate them with maple syrup and they were fab.
These will probably be my basic pancake recipe from now on. The ricotta makes all the difference hey?

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Star shaped honeycomb butter - woohoo! I made these pancakes once, and loved how fluffy they were. Have yet to try the real thing from the cafe!
item.content:encoded: Star shaped honeycomb butter – woohoo! I made these pancakes once, and loved how fluffy they were. Have yet to try the real thing from the cafe!

item.title: By: Sweets at Vicky's
item.dc:creator: Sweets at Vicky's
item.description: You know, I've heard soo much about these pancakes I am just itching to try them. But at the restaurant itself! I was in Sydney but didn't though...*grumble* boys are so hard to wake up in the morning! Thanks for sharing though, hopefully I can recreate it!
item.content:encoded: You know, I’ve heard soo much about these pancakes I am just itching to try them. But at the restaurant itself! I was in Sydney but didn’t though…*grumble* boys are so hard to wake up in the morning! Thanks for sharing though, hopefully I can recreate it!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I love these! They're so light and delicious. Very cute honeycomb butter stars too :D
item.content:encoded: I love these! They’re so light and delicious. Very cute honeycomb butter stars too ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Cakelaw
item.dc:creator: Cakelaw
item.description: These look fabulous - now if only I can persuade someone to make them for me for breakfast ...
item.content:encoded: These look fabulous – now if only I can persuade someone to make them for me for breakfast …

item.title: By: Angela
item.dc:creator: Angela
item.description: Hi, What a beautiful blog you have...simply sensational recipes, photos and stories. Thank you. Could you please tell me what sugar honeycomb is and where to buy it? Thanks again for making life more wonderful because of your contribution to it.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, What a beautiful blog you have…simply sensational recipes, photos and stories. Thank you.
Could you please tell me what sugar honeycomb is and where to buy it?
Thanks again for making life more wonderful because of your contribution to it.

item.title: By: Ellie
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description: This is my favourite pancake recipe!! I like the star shaped butter! Nice touch!
item.content:encoded: This is my favourite pancake recipe!! I like the star shaped butter! Nice touch!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: The beaten eggwhites must make them really fluffy, and the ricotta sounds good too! Sounds perfect for the weekend.
item.content:encoded: The beaten eggwhites must make them really fluffy, and the ricotta sounds good too! Sounds perfect for the weekend.

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: I love pancakes, too! I absolutely have to try these. YUM! By the way, I have something for you on my blog.
item.content:encoded: I love pancakes, too! I absolutely have to try these. YUM! By the way, I have something for you on my blog.

item.title: By: Trissa
item.dc:creator: Trissa
item.description: Anita, they look so light and fluffy! No wonder you love them.
item.content:encoded: Anita, they look so light and fluffy! No wonder you love them.
